website_summaries.verdict: Tops our shortlist for features and design. You won't find a swaddle that has more to offer in terms of flexibility or a more practical design.
pros: Made of rayon from natural bamboo for superb softness and breathable comfort
Can also serve multiple uses, such as a breastfeeding cover up or burp cloth
cons: They are somewhat difficult to swaddle, and our testers found that they don't stay as secure as swaddles with various closures

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: these were purchased for a friend, but I've used these swaddles with my kid some years ago and they make our lives as first time parents way easier. First and foremost, these swaddling blankets are breathable, so even if the kiddo manages to get out of it, bunch it up, and get it all over their face, they can still breathe through it. These are also not as hot as other blankets, so the kiddo won't bake while swaddled. Second, they are much larger than the regular blankets, so you can actually swaddle the your baby as long as they need to be swaddled.
customer_reviews.author: manjunja

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy McScratcherson
customer_reviews.text: Loved the size of these and the adorable pattern. That is where the love ended. What have you done Aiden and Anais?? I could always rely on you for softness. My girls still sleep with their Aden and Anais blankets from When they were little babes (6 and 3 years ago), so I know you are capable of quality. These will hopefully hold up, but good grief they are scratchy. I don’t even like holding them with the baby. I’m keeping them to wash and wash them in hopes they soften up, but we are on wash number five on most of these (at LEAST) right now and no signs of softening. Shame.
customer_reviews.author: MommyofTwo

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these. They're not the softest brand right out ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. They're not the softest brand right out of the box, but they get softer after each wash while remaining "sturdy". After using at least six different brands for the past year and a half (I have a 22 month old and a 5 month old), this brand has become my favorite. I no longer swaddle, but I also like these as breathable, regular blankets. The Bambi prints are gorgeous and look even better in person than they do on the screen. I also have and recommend the "Global Garden" prints which are lovely without being too typical.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these swaddles so much! They are by far my favorite. My son is definitely a "blanket kid" and these are my favorite to give to him (he loves any muslin blanket). The colors are super vibrant, the material is thick and the blankets are a good size. We used them when he was smaller to swaddle him and they worked great for that as well. Now that he's older, he just loves on them when he's going to sleep <3 I'm obsessed with the patterns (I call him my "Man Cub")! I would definitely buy again...I'm really tempted to get all of the Disney ones, but my husband would kill me.
customer_reviews.author: Booknerd28Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I do love them but....
customer_reviews.text: These worked well as swaddles during my sons first few weeks. Then he started squirming way more and would get out of these so fast. They’re not stretchy so as long as he fussed long enough he’d get out of them. So now I use them as blankets, covers, etc. I do love them. The only thing is I noticed that the ones I bought here on amazon(animal print) is much thinner than the ones I received from my friend as a baby shower gift(star print). A little weird but okay... still okay for what I use them for.
customer_reviews.author: passionfrootgreentea

customer_reviews.title: best baby blankets
customer_reviews.text: These are hands down my favorite baby blankets! My oldest was gifted a 2 pack as a baby, and she still uses them now (she's 4) as her blankies at daycare. They're worn from being constantly used, but have held up great. I bought this 4 pack for my 1 year old, these are the most beautiful colors, and I know they'll last her too. (The big size means they don't grow out of them super fast!)
customer_reviews.author: richa521

customer_reviews.title: Give them a try if on the fence.
customer_reviews.text: I must admit I wasn’t sold on the muslin blankets...in fact my sister in law gave me two she had from her kid. They sat in her changing table until...my daughter (2 months old at the time) decided she can’t sleep without her blanket up by her face. These are completely breathable. I have layered them as much as I could and tried breathing myself. (We move it away constantly and when it’s bed time at night I completely take it away since I’m not watching her) But if that wasn’t the best reason to get them wait until it’s 80+ degrees outside and you want something light to cover your little one with.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G.

customer_reviews.title: Rough and stiff; not like other a + a blankets
customer_reviews.text: I am so surprised and disappointed. I own aden + anais blankets and love them which is why I bought this set. These feel nothing like my others. These are rough and stiff. They are not a nice material at all and are not soft like the others I own. I am confused by the difference in quality. I do not recommend. I would suggest buying a set in a store instead so you can feel them to ensure they are the soft ones.
customer_reviews.author: K.H.

customer_reviews.title: Soft, adorable, lightweight blankets
customer_reviews.text: One week at home so far, and I've used ours a decent amount. They're soft and lightweight, so we use it to swaddle her when we want a lighter option. The patterns are also super cute, and the blanket is larger than traditional swaddle blankets so you have more room to play with - also more fabric if you're still getting the hang of swaddling. I'm sure we will continue to use them for the next few years at least.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are hands down our favorite and most used blankets
customer_reviews.text: Yes these blankets are expensive but they are so worth it. I have a few products that I purchased for my baby and these rate in the top few. They are hands down our favorite and most used blankets. We have other blankets that shrunk, pilled, etc. and these do not. They get softer every time we wash them and hold up great. They have such cute prints (ours are the up, up and away with animals floating) and are very nice. They are excellent for swaddling and are the perfect size. We just love these!
customer_reviews.author: L. Ferri

customer_reviews.title: Quality lacking
customer_reviews.text: Considering I paid $50 for these 4 swaddle blankets, I expected a better quality. One of the blankets ripped right at the edge 3 days after use. (Washed using the care instructions) I liked that they are larger sizes, but the quality is lacking. Not very soft material, gauze like with minimum stretch. Contacted the company about my dissatisfaction, no response. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cristin

customer_reviews.title: Buy something cheaper, just paying for the name.
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are underwhelming. They are not the quality I would expect given the price point and other reviews. They are very large so i would imagine they might be more handy when baby is larger.
customer_reviews.author: ALfromTX

customer_reviews.title: Absolute must have
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never used these as swaddle blankets, but rather as everything blankets. They are very convenient as nursing covers, to block out bright light, keep the baby warm, burp cloths... they are truly great, breathable yet warm when you need them to. These aden and anais swaddle blankets are just great in every way.
customer_reviews.author: MariaG

customer_reviews.title: These are the best!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sister in law for gift. The pattern is very cute, true to picture. We probably have 10 Aiden and Anais blankets and love them. When my kids were infants we used them as swaddles, covers on car seats, blankets in car, shade in stroller, nursing covers and even now still have them in the car. They are a great size, high quality and wash really well. Would recommend for any family. We also have the dream blankets, which are great!
customer_reviews.author: JNel

customer_reviews.title: These are great little blankets
customer_reviews.text: These swaddles are the best! We got a couple as hand me downs and I knew when these ones went on sale that we were going to need more. They're perfect-- large enough to actually bundle our little dude, but thin enough that we can fold them into a square for his cute little monthly pictures or use them in his car seat. They only get softer with every wash!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Overton

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely adores these blankets. The material is soft and lightweight perfect for little ones to be swaddled in or simply snuggling to sleep. I used mine as breastfeeding cover as well since they are large enough to cover easily and breathable. Now he over 1 and has multiple versions of this blanket by this brand and loves them all. These make a great gift :)
customer_reviews.author: Alexielyn93

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Baby approved!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves them and drags one around all day and can’t sleep without it! Good quality. sizable. It’s slightly warmer than I would prefer for my baby especially during spring weather when neither the heat nor the AC are turning on. I wash them very often and they still look as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Abby_AZ_15

customer_reviews.title: Great shower gift!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these blankets! I purchased them for a baby shower gift. They are my go-to gift after receiving my own when my daughter was born. They can be used as a blanket, nursing cover, car seat canopy, swaddle, burp cloth, on-the-go changing pad, etc. These are the blankets we used when we introduced our daughter to sleeping with a blanket. They are so soft and breathable and get softer every time you wash them. I can't say enough great things about these blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda V Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: love  love love. multipurpose
customer_reviews.text: love it... its multi purpose.. i can use these as a burp cloth, diaper changing blanket, shopping cart blanket, high chair blanket especially those dirty and untrusted ones on the restaurants. i also use this as nursing blanket when Im breastfeeding in public and my baby can easily breathe through it, i dont have to worry about suffocating her with thick nursing blanket because of its soft and breathable texture. will definitely recommend to all my mom friends. and will gift to all baby shower. 😍
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite baby blankets
customer_reviews.text: Our favorite baby blankets. These are soft, breathable fabric, and I love the simple star design. The size is perfect for swaddling older babies and not just newborns. I also like these for times when I need a little modesty while nursing; they are light enough to prevent my baby from getting too warm. Our middle child still uses his as comfort blankets when sleeping...he's nearly three, and they have held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Hoskins Family

customer_reviews.title: The best and cutest receiving blankets out there
customer_reviews.text: Great Muslim blankets. So soft and cute. They wash beautifully and after many uses and washes still look like new. Little animals design are so cute and colorful. Makes my. Any smile every time she looks at them. Perfect for wrapping your baby, as a cover, and in our case, as a security blanket. Highly recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING BLANKETS! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: These are our absolute favorite blankets. Aden and Anais blankets are so soft, they waffle up in the dryer after washing and literally get softer with every use. These blankets are great for swaddling or even just for sleeping with because the fabric is lightweight and breathable so you don't have to worry about suffocation. I think they are also endorsed by the national foundation for SIDS. These blankets also have many uses, we use them as changing pads, nursing covers, blankets to lay on at the park, lightweight summer blankets, etc. I give these as baby shower gifts all the time and recommend them to all my mommy friends!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey S.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: These weren’t as soft and smooth as a smaller versions. the descriptions are the same so I don’t really know why one smaller style is softer than the other. I do love the blankets. They’re the perfect size the designs are adorable and they do a good job of keeping my baby warm.
customer_reviews.author: Huma

customer_reviews.title: Super Coarse material.  No bamboo cotton. More like sand paper
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible. Super coarse. Gauze feels softer than these blankets. No amount of washing will improve the softness. Perhaps it is the print which feels even more coarse than the white areas. I am returning these, and recommend you look for only the bamboo cotton Aden and Anais.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Nikolaev

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer swaddling blanket!
customer_reviews.text: For someone who identify themselves as a real cheapskate, these expensive blankets were a real stretch. However, I went ahead and made the purchase and have fallen in love with these blankets. They were perfect for swaddling my summer baby even on days we didn't run the air conditioning (we allow our house to reach 80 degrees before we run the air conditioning). They worked well as a nursing cover too. No more of those tiny swaddling blankets, these will actually keep my baby swaddled. The pack of four seems to be just the right amount to have. I will definitely recommend these to someone else. I wish I would have had them 4 babies ago!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Love Aden & Anais Swaddle Blankets!
customer_reviews.text: Love Aden & Anais Swaddle Blankets! The quality, designs, and colors are beautiful for our baby girl. They are very generous in size and offer versatility. They roll up nicely to fit in a diaper caddy or diaper bag. So glad I chose this brand over all the others out there.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: not the best for swaddling
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps it is personal preference but these are not good swaddling cloths for newborns at all. At 47" they are actually way too big and on top of that these are stretchy and super spongy. That makes it difficult to make a tight wrap and even when you did, it gives so babies can wiggle loose. Perhaps they are good for older babies (mine is 10 weeks and 12lbs now) but then again the older babies need less swaddling. But yes the cloths are very soft except for the stripe one cause of the dye material they used to print makes that one stiffer and rougher than the rest.
customer_reviews.author: pui wah

customer_reviews.title: My girls each have 8 swaddle blankets and love them. They sleep with them everyday and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for all my friends as a baby shower gift all the time. My girls each have 8 swaddle blankets and love them. They sleep with them everyday and it comforts them. They are all soft and easy to wash. Love this one especially because it is easy to swaddle the baby too!
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: So good I don't even think about it
customer_reviews.text: These are very soft, machine washable, they look nice, they feel like they are made well, and are very lightweight so easy to pack. This is a great option for a gift, as we ended up needing more swaddles than we originally thought. They pack up very nicely in the diaper bag, so we always have a few spares on hand as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Definitely the number one choice for swaddle blanket
customer_reviews.text: We really love the material because even after several times of wash, it's still elastic and very easy for me to swaddle the baby firmly. We also have Hudson Baby Swaddle blanket, after the first wash, the blanket cannot swaddle that baby well, my baby could easily get rid of the blanket even after I tried hard to swaddle her. I'd suggest this over the other brands although it's a little pricey, but you get the quality you need.
customer_reviews.author: ming mou

customer_reviews.title: Best baby blankets!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love aden + anais products and this pattern is beautiful! Just a note -- as a mother of 5 and frequent purchaser of aden + anais products I would recommend these blankets over the aden by aden + anais brand (sold at Target, other retailers and on amazon as well). These are larger and better quality. These are really the best baby blankets and I use them for everything -- swaddling, burp cloth, nursing cover, car seat cover, the list could go on and on. Definitely buy these!!
customer_reviews.author: MamaofFive

customer_reviews.title: Great blankets!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these blankets! We have twins and these are now the only blankets we use. We got rid of most of our other blankets and bought several more of these. We own about 30 now. They are very breathable a d extremely soft on our babies delicate eczema prone skin. When doubled up they are also very warm, but not too warm. We live in Arizona and it gets very hot. These blankets let me wrap them so they feel secure without overheating them. I keep several in the car to use as shade from the sun on their stroller and their car seats. Keeps the sun off their face without making them hotter.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B.

customer_reviews.title: Large muslin blankets with vivid colors
customer_reviews.text: These blankets are so nice! They are a great size for a nursing cover up or for swaddling. The Lion King print is so bright and colorful. They get softer the more they are washed and are overall great quality blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: A baby must-have
customer_reviews.text: Every mom needs multiple sets of these! I can't really say much about A+A blankets that hasn't already been said. We use these constantly and for everything from spitup to swaddling to propping baby's head up for nursing. I do recommend the classic (these) versus the Aden by A+A blankets sold in stores. In my opinion the larger size and thicker, softer fabric is well worth the few extra dollars. The night sky set is one of the more gender neutral patterns, although still more boyish. My only feedback is that the patterns are mostly blue or pink - I wish there were more neutral options.
customer_reviews.author: ReesedLightning

customer_reviews.title: Perfect baby shower gift, mom can never have too many!
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my cousin who is expecting a baby girl! She already had a bunch from her first baby boy but was thrilled to have some girly ones now too. Aden + Anais swaddles are a must-have and you can never have too many for baby!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Soft, versatile, pretty and useful!
customer_reviews.text: I super love these pretty swaddle blanket! It’s big, feels soft and very useful. I use it for my baby as a swaddling blanket and I use it during breast pumping, very versatile! My baby and I can still use these forever! Lol! I have 6 blankets and I love to have more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Ursula

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, organic blankets
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful. They are light weight and breathable so the baby is not sweating when she wakes up from sleeping. I was not even aware of how versatile it was as it is 47”x47” which allows you to use as a blanket as they age, a cover for strollers, even a cover for changing table. I will probably buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Good product, high-quality
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really understand why you would need muslin blankets until after the baby was born and I could tell that he was too hot in other blankets and swaddle wraps (we live in a warm place with 100+ summers). I have a long baby so the large size of these blankets were great. He has moved on to the aden + anais sleep sacks (which I LOVE) but I still use the blankets to cover his carrier and have tied it around him when he has had to sleep in his bouncer. Would definitely buy again and have recommended to people I know having babies.
customer_reviews.author: MMarti

customer_reviews.title: Multifunctional use
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly soft for babies. I actually use it as burp cloth/ cover the baby seat/ while feeding/overchanging mat/ as blanket on sunny days. I love the fact that it has multiple use. I have not used for swaddling as I could not swaddle him tight enough in it but I m sure it can be used very well for that purpose. I had ready to swaddle set so I did not really need these for that purpose. But this product is certainly a must have in baby registry.
customer_reviews.author: SSK

customer_reviews.title: Newborn Essential!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size and weight for swaddling a newborn! Get softer the more you wash and dry them. Also work as a summer weight blanket in a stroller or car seat. Or, drape one over the car seat or stroller to keep sun and bugs off baby, but let cool breezes in. Use them on the floor for tummy time, too. Very cute patterns. Wash and dry beautifully time after time. Truly a layette/newborn essential item.
customer_reviews.author: ACM

customer_reviews.title: One in scratchy
customer_reviews.text: Love all aden and anais products. And I have to say, with the swaddlers I really think it pays off to spend a little more and get the original Aden and Anais and not the "Aden by...." product. I LOVE this pattern, we have the crib sheet and the Dream blanket and I could not be happier with those. However in this set the blue blanket with the red stripe is very scratchy. Especially for swaddling a newborn it is not snuggly like the other three are. I even washed it a few extra times to see if it would soften, but it didn't. I am disappointed that I wasn't able to use all four blankets for the price.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mastrigt

customer_reviews.title: Cute, versatile, and high quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love these blankets, and so does my baby boy. They are the perfect size for swaddling or for covering his car seat or stroller to keep out the sun. They are also lightweight & breathable, which is great for warm climates! These blankets hold up well in the wash (just don't wash them with anything that has Velcro) and they get softer with each wash. The best part about these, at least for a Disney fan like myself, is that they are Jungle Book themed!
customer_reviews.author: Grosse Pointe MomTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Fake Aden and Anais blankets
customer_reviews.text: The swaddle blankets I received are not the original Aden and Anais swaddle blankets because at the same time I ordered a set from original Aden and Anais website, there is a huge difference in the quality and softness of the muslin cloth. The one from amazon are fake ones with rough texture and poor quality. I would not purchase again. Total disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty soft cotton covers
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for a baby shower and has yet to be delivered to the recipient. The package had an open window in the box so, even without opening the box, I was able to feel the cotton. It was soft and pretty. 4 different designs, all lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: They are huge for swaddling and are nice and light weight to use as a cover
customer_reviews.text: These muslin blankets are a life saver. My little guy loves how they feel and it they help him to calm down. They are huge for swaddling and are nice and light weight to use as a cover. We take ours everywhere! I babywear my little guy so when we were at the zoo I wanted to protect his legs from the sun so we put this over his legs. We put this in the shopping cart with him, to protect the areas the cart cover does not cover. We have washed these many times and they are not showing any major signs of wear. We love them, and have bought other muslin items for him due to this.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Henkelman

customer_reviews.title: Love These a Bit TOO Much
customer_reviews.text: Review by wife- I have an unhealthy affinity towards muslin swaddle blankets. Aden + Anais, to be specific. I've been purchasing them as baby shower gifts, then purchased an organic & bamboo set when expecting, & picked up another set of classic once baby arrived. We use them for everything. Pretty much everything except swaddling, haha. Great car seat cover, nursing cover, folded to become a burping cloth, a little corner to wipe the baby's mouth, laid out as a play area, used to shield the sun, blankey, lovey.. just an all-purpose wonderful product. Plus, the prints are just adorable.
customer_reviews.author: James Kim

customer_reviews.title: Toddler still loves these
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these when my daughter was young enough to swaddle and we still love them now that she's a toddler as much as we did then. These are perfect for swaddling, but even if swaddling doesn't work out or isn't your thing, they are superb all-around baby blankets. Super-duper soft, light, hold up great through countless washes--my daughter is now almost 16 months old and she still cuddles with one of these blankets every night as her "blankie". I have been so impressed with the softness, utility, and quality of these blankets that I wouldn't think about trying a different brand if they ever needed to be replaced. These make the perfect shower gift for a new or soon-to-be mom!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome blankets
customer_reviews.text: HUGE. They just get softer the more you wash them. Lightweight, but will keep baby warm when swaddled and the environment is a little cool. We're never without one. We use them for swaddling, to lay on when doing tummy time or active time, to tuck around baby in the car seat, to drape over the car seat to keep bugs and sun out, as a light cover for nursing, or a light blanket to cover up baby's feet when he is nursing. I do wish they were a little less expensive, the cost is prohibitive to having a bunch of them so I'm constantly washing them. But still, they're awesome blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very inconsistent quality.
customer_reviews.text: These were disappointing in material softness and quality compared to the Aden & Anais swaddle blankets I already have. My others are noticeably softer and better quality; these simply aren't the same. They started shredding within 6 weeks; very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. V

customer_reviews.title: Just Adorable!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this TIMELESS print. the blankets are excellent quality material, the print is intricate and well crafted, and the size of the blanket is generous! I can't wait to use these daily-if I can keep from hanging them on the blanket latter for decor ha!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these blankets. They are perfect for swaddling, nice and big unlike so many of the other baby blankets out there. We use them for pretty much everything - swaddling, burp cloths, they are nice and light for covering baby on slightly cooler days, and occasionally as a nursing cover. They are a bit pricey but I feel like they are worth every penny. They wash really well and last a long time. We are still using some with our newborn that we got four years ago with our second baby. This star print is super cute and neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great for swaddling big babies
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy these for my first baby because I thought they were overpriced and unnecessary. My second baby loved to be swaddled though but she was so big that she burst through any regular receiving blanket! Other reviewers stated that these blankets are good for swaddling big babies and they were right! I'm so glad I sprung for these as they are one of my favorite baby items now, even for use beyond swaddling, as well as a go-to shower gift. I still think they are expensive, but I'm glad we made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Swaddle
customer_reviews.text: These are generously sized, breathable, stretchy swaddles with nice friction. If you know how to use a traditional square swaddle, this is the one to use. (If you don't, then find something with a velcro!) The a+a swaddles aren't super warm, so I double swaddle, first with this to keep her bound up, then with a baby blanket. These keep her well-constrained, even now that she's a little bit bigger (~10 lbs). They seem very comfortable and come in nice prints, too. Highly recommend. Great shower gift, as they are expensive. Will work fine as hand-me-downs, too. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: K. Carson

customer_reviews.title: They are a better quality than those you can purchase for less
customer_reviews.text: These are always a welcome gift - soft, durable, extra big, so mothers can use them in multiple ways - as a swaddle, to cover nursing babies gently, as an impromptu sunshade...wash them and use them again! They are a better quality than those you can purchase for less.
customer_reviews.author: Pixie

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and versatile
customer_reviews.text: When I first received these I thought they were way to big to swaddle a newborn, I did have to research how to properly swaddle with these blankets. Once I figured it out i couldn’t go back to the regular receiving blankets. They have nice prints and are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Aiden & Anais swaddles
customer_reviews.text: Not only did we use these with our two boys when they were small babies (now 18months and 4yrs old), but these are my go to gift for any baby shower! Plus our boys still love to cuddle with their blankies. So much more use than just a swaddle too. I would definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: A must have for every baby!
customer_reviews.text: This are a must for every baby. They are large enough to swaddle well without being too bulky. They breath well and they get softer with every wash. I have ordered a new set for all three of my kids and they hold up so well. My 2 year old uses the original ones I got 7+ years ago. He doesn’t go anywhere without them. This is a great gift to welcome a new baby.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Useful AND Adorable
customer_reviews.text: These blankets came highly recommended and they did not disappoint! They are my go-to blanket; I use them as a play mat, to add extra shade to my stroller, and, of course, to bundle my sweet babe. While I enjoy the simplicity of the sleep sacks for swaddling, if I am ever without a sleep sack these blankets are the best, especially on those hot summer days when my son needed a swaddle.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Evans

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive and hardly used
customer_reviews.text: We found these to be way too stretchy to use as swaddles and too bulky for daily use as a blanket when leaving the house. Baby broke out of the swaddle instantly. Check out Anna & Eve swaddle strap if you are looking for a swaddle! That has been our absolute favorite and you can dress baby in any clothes underneath without worrying about adding bulk or the baby breaking out!
customer_reviews.author: Kowitz113

customer_reviews.title: Great swaddles
customer_reviews.text: This print is so cute & we gifted it to our good friends having a little boy. The price was great because wit was 15$ cheaper than from the Aden & Anias Website with prime shipping so that’s always a bonus!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Dunn

customer_reviews.title: In Love with A+A
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. I am an Aden + Anais fan all the way. We own several sets and it's true that the boutique quality ones are better. They are definitely softer than the other lines sold at Target and Babies R Us. They wash well and have just gotten even softer with time. My son is absolutely obsessed with them and insists on sleeping with a stack full every night. Additionally, you can use these as a carseat cover when they're infants as well as a quick nursing cover hen on the go. I recommend this brand to everybody and anything from A+A is sure to make the perfect shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are very adorable! Not the softest though, even after washing. I also find the one with the blue circles all over it, is much more stiff than the rest. However, I do use these daily and baby doesn't seem bothered!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: My favorite new baby blankets
customer_reviews.text: These swaddle blankets are very high quality. The Jungle Book theme is nice change from the normal Disney selection of merchandise. These blankets are by far my biggest swaddles I have from many different brands. They have a nice weight to them so they will keep baby warm but also breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W

customer_reviews.title: All soft except the blue striped blanket
customer_reviews.text: These were great except for the blue striped blanket- for some reason the blue stripes are stiff. I can’t swaddle as well with it. Others are fine though
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: New baby must have
customer_reviews.text: This is our third four pack we've purchased. We used basic flannel swaddling blankets for our older kids then we found these. What a difference. Our older kids were only ever swaddled for a few weeks before getting too big for the blankets. They would get hot and fussy while wrapped up. Not so with these. They're plenty big enough to swaddle for months and they are breathable enough to use in summer or winter. They also have tons of other uses - sun shade, nursing cover, changing pad, 'emergency' towel. I now recommend these to any new moms I know.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This item was a gift to a person that raves about them. She is thrilled. I have not personally used them and she has not had her baby yet but I do know that other similar gauze type receiving blankets are great.
customer_reviews.author: stampolina

customer_reviews.title: Nice & big
customer_reviews.text: Nice and big! Never seen swaddles this big before. Beautiful prints! Unfortunately couldn’t use them- my son hated being swaddled. Still have them with intentions to use as light blankets when needed, I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Essential
customer_reviews.text: I use these SO often- for so many things. Something about them is so snuggly. They make lovely light blankets,swaddle blankets, and nursing covers. They truly get softer after every wash. I love giving these as shower presents. I have seen some reviews about them tearing easily & actually experienced this with my first set. However, I contacted them and they were more than generous in replacing the product and I have had no problems with the new blankets. Even were I have snagged them they do not unravel as one of the blankets in my first set. If you have had problems with your blankets I encourage you to contact the company as they were lovely to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Soft and breathable
customer_reviews.text: These are our favorite brand of Muslin swaddle blankets. We are on our 4th baby and have bought a few packs of these blankets for personal use and also as baby gifts. Many uses for these. Swaddle baby..these are large so you can use them on bigger babies too. Light and airy blanket, for shade over infant seat stroller, etc. Our 4 year old still carries around his favorite blankey and can't go to sleep without it. Ironically his name is Linus.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Top of the line product and they are larger than your normal swaddle blanket which makes it easier for the baby to stay swaddled not mention breathable too. Grandson doesn't overheat with Aden and Anais like he does with other brands. Super soft and I couldn't be more pleased with my purchase. First time Grandma **smiles** and I have purchased many things for the new baby, but the Aden Anais is by far the softest and best items of the many name brands purchased. May be a bit more money, but WELL worth it in my book!
customer_reviews.author: *Purplestorm

customer_reviews.title: Best muslin blankets
customer_reviews.text: In terms of muslin blankets, aden + anais classic series is the way to go. We received another brand of muslin blankets but they were smaller (44" x 44" instead of aden + anais' 47" x 47"). The other brand must've also shrank more because they were too short to swaddle our baby effectively. Our baby is now 23" long and we can still use aden + anais to swaddle her. I also use muslin blankets as a nursing cover, stroller cover, blanket, to wipe up spit up if burp cloths are not nearby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: The best multipurpose swaddle
customer_reviews.text: The best multipurpose swaddle! Great for swaddling, covering stroller/car seat, Dr. check ups, warm summer days and nights. They wash beautifully only had a issue with one swaddle of another collectiion..the Princess Posie collection. Which was the red striped one never felt as soft as the rest and ripped only after two washes. Over all I love these and purchased this collection for my second little girl!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything Promised
customer_reviews.text: These are muslin and über soft - this gift was for my newborn nephew. We used them continuously from the birthing suite to a restaurant two weeks later. Even after he didn't want swaddling, this was large enough to become a very lightweight cover for my sis-in-law during breastfeeding in a restaurant, a nice clean surface to lay him down for a diaper change, and a blankie. My sister-in-law always packs one. Hint: Buy a set that has slightly different patterns on each swaddle. That way you know which one you used last as they are CONTINUALLY in use, and which one goes into the wash. Oh, and they wash and dry beautifully, no high maintenance at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Carson

customer_reviews.title: Not as soft as expected
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of swaddles but I’m learning that the ones that have lots of printing on them aren’t as soft. I have others of this brand without as many graphics and they are way softer. I was hoping that the more I waded them the softer they get but it’s not happening.
customer_reviews.author: Kati Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Love these blankets
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these blankets. They are a good size, soft but grippy enough to swaddle a growing baby. We used them as swaddlers until our son was almost 4 months old and started rolling. Now we use them as blankets, burp cloths, nursing covers, peek-a-boo sheets, stroller covers, and anything else we can think of. They hold up great and just get better the more you use them. The star pattern is pretty large which is a nice change from some of the more "cutesy" prints.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Christophel

customer_reviews.title: Sending it BACK
customer_reviews.text: bad quality fabrics, very rough and not smooth and soft as advertised. It's going back.
customer_reviews.author: WinWin

customer_reviews.title: Best swaddle blankets
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered these blankets about 15 months ago and have washed them many times and they are softer and still look great. My daughter loved them when she was a baby and they worked great as a cover when nursing. They are light weight so carrying them in the diaper bag is a breeze and they don't take up a lot of room. Great for summertime when you need something to cover them from the sun because it is so light weight. I ended up buying two packs but do make sure that they are the larger ones. I have seem them at target but if you look at the sizes they are different.
customer_reviews.author: chibbi

customer_reviews.title: Love Aden + Anais!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite blankets! I received these as well as a cheaper version. The cheaper version does not compare. These are the best! The blankets are the perfect thickness and they swaddle great because they give somewhat when wrapping. They wash great and do not shrink when dried. Be aware if you wash bibs at the same time that the velcro on the bibs may stick and pull the material of the blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Crissie B.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like it because it’s not soft. I bought because I like the prints.
customer_reviews.author: Ewa Flak

customer_reviews.title: You have to get this
customer_reviews.text: Literally, I use this everyday! You can change diaper on it. You can wrap baby in it. Even when baby spit, if you don’t have napkin around you, just use this! So easy to clean! This is a must have when you have a new born!
customer_reviews.author: Zhun Z.

customer_reviews.title: These blankets are awful! They were falling apart right ...
customer_reviews.text: These blankets are awful! They were falling apart right out of the package and sheds lint everywhere! I exchanged for another package hoping it was a fluke, no such luck. The second package had the same issues.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with the blankets! Want one in every color! Great for warm and cold weather. Also works as a sun shade on the car seat during walks. Also the best cloth I have found to soak up spit up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice blankets, but wow are they expensive!
customer_reviews.text: I mean seriously, this is four blankets for a baby. I am not sure why I thought they would solve all of life's problems ... which is the only reason I paid what I did for them! Our baby doesn't really give a crap about which blanket we use, as long as he can squirm his way out of the swaddle and/or put it in his mouth, he's good. I would say if you can get a deal on these, sure, get them. They are light, breathable, and very large which is great for swaddling. Some blankets feel like they are going to bake your little one, these do not feel that way at all but will keep him warm.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: My top baby product!
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother with velcro swaddle bags. My baby hated those! These blankets gently swaddle my baby securely. It's great as a nursing cover (more breathable than any on the market, great for summer) -- just tie a knot around your neck. Great to drape over the car seat to protect against the sun. Great as a blanket anywhere! For cooler weather, I swaddle once and wrap a second blanket rolled around the swaddle. I bought 2 sets (8 total). The extra ones come in handy for daycare and for when the baby starts to grab it and put it in his mouth and drool all over it.
customer_reviews.author: KatnissCa

customer_reviews.title: Nice for price
customer_reviews.text: These worked great. Nice and lightweight for summer months. Wash well but do not dry well, hang dry to keep from shrinking and missing shaping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-purpose blankets
customer_reviews.text: We have two sets of these and I love how multipurpose they are. We use them on our changing table in place of a changing pad, since if it gets wet we can easily swap out to another one without worrying about running out. We also use them for a changing pad on the go, for tummy time, as a nursing cover, a lightweat blanket while being held, and of course for swaddling. They are soft, lightweight, and roll up well for the diaper bag. And of course, they are super cute. One set we have is from Target, and one is from Amazon, and I haven't noticed a difference in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Risa D. Cyr

customer_reviews.title: Soft, substantial, but definitely overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on sale and still don't think it was worth the price. However, the designs are adorable, and I had some gift cards waiting to be used. You can make your own by stitching together muslin fabric when it goes on sale at places like Jo-Ann's. You can even make your own designs or dye them your favorite colors -- just Google search for inspiration. Also, in case you were wondering, even the "original" aden + anais stuff is made in China. Still, it is softer than the Target aden by aden + anais version.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian L

customer_reviews.title: Very good blankets
customer_reviews.text: I bought these blankets because I had friends that raved about them. My son gets hot very easily, so I really wanted a baby blanket that wouldn't overheat him. He's also very big for his age, so I needed a bigger-than-average baby blanket. These blankets fit the bill very well. They're big, not terribly thick to the point of overheating baby, and very soft. I feel like the price is a touch unreasonable, but they seem to be holding up well which would help justify the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: ben04

customer_reviews.title: Love this print!
customer_reviews.text: I love A&A! These swaddled are wonderful and I love the print. These are the larger ones 47x47 which I prefer because it's big enough to swaddle without running out of material! They wash well and I've used them as a cover for nursing when I was Ina. Pinch- a cover over the bassinet on walks, on the floor for tummy time and backdrops for photos! They are a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: LnASmom

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!
customer_reviews.text: These swaddles are great! I wish I had them with my first. Baby loves being wrapped up and now that summer is fast approaching, I love the light breatheable nature of the cotton. Feels great, stretches over baby, and snuggles her just right. Quality fabric (cotton) and Cute pattern too!
customer_reviews.author: Chris DeeGee

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price! High quality. *Updated
customer_reviews.text: These blankets are very soft and breathable. I was hesitant to give my toddler a blanket to sleep with for fear of it going over his face or overeating, but these are light enough with tiny holes that it is not a concern. They are excellent quality and have not unraveled one bit in the past year. I wish I had purchased these when my son was an infant to use as swaddles, knowing that I would still be getting use out of them every night. *Update We have had these for 4 years now and have been used for multiple children. They are still like new!
customer_reviews.author: Healthy FitMom

customer_reviews.title: We use these for everything and we love them. They are big enough that if it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Every mom should have these! We use these for everything and we love them. They are big enough that if it's cold, you can double it up and use it as a swaddle or blanket. If it's warm, you can just lay it over the baby and it's warm enough. Our son loves the feel of it as well so we ordered lovies made by the same company. I only wish I had known about Aden and Anais before we bought our crib bedding because I would have purchased all Aden and Anais stuff! Now we know for the next baby!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand for swaddle blankets. I have tried multiple other brands and none of them compare to this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Best Baby Blankets EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I've tossed all my other baby blankets out the window. These Aden & Anais Muslin Swaddle Wraps are the absolute best. They are good for everything you can think of: swaddling, stroller covers, nursing cover, playing peek-a-boo, big enough to lay on the grass, light enough for hot days but warm enough for cooler nights. I even use them to cover baby's precious light skin while carrying her in the Baby Bjorn. They are a bit pricy, but totally worth it. They are soft and I love the prints. I have 3 or 4 sets of them and use them all the time. If I were Oprah, I would give these away as My Favorite Things!
customer_reviews.author: LovinMaui

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a baby shower gift. It was on the mother's registry but they looked like a very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: We were gifted a set for our first baby and when we got pregnant a second time this was first on our wish list. Perfect for swaddling - our little one outgrew traditional swaddling blankets within two weeks. The give of the muslin allows for a snug, secure swaddle and the patterns are adorable for both a girl and boy. This is also "the" gift that we send to all expecting parents.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie F.

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and durable
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for over a year now and they are high quality. I've washed them many times and they still retain its shape and softness. Beautiful prints.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these blankets. We bought two packs when my son was born, they are his loveys and go EVERYWHERE with us. They are just as soft as the day he was born, not faded, simply loved. We have number two on the way and his own sets are washed and waiting for him. Totally worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Bubs mamma

customer_reviews.title: Favorite baby item, hands down
customer_reviews.text: I love Love LOVE these swaddle/receiving blankets. Not only are they adorable, but they are also one of the most functional baby items I own. We do not leave the house without at least one of these as they have so many uses. Great as car seat covers, nursing covers, blankets, swaddles, floor covers for tummy time, burp cloths, and mess cleaner-uppers! Additionally, they are incredibly soft, and I swear they get softer with each wash. The fact that they are breathable is also great because I feel safe letting my baby sleep swaddled in these blankets.
customer_reviews.author: maura

customer_reviews.title: Versatile & Cute
customer_reviews.text: We received several Aden + Anais swaddle blankets as gifts for my daughter before she was born, so I ordered these when we found out our second little one is a boy. They came in handy for many different uses outside of the basic swaddle - nursing cover, burp cloth, toy, etc. They were my go-to blanket to keep an extra back-up in the car and diaper bag since they are light weight and don't take up much room. Cute patterns for my soon-to-be son, also! They seem to be rather stiff out of the package, but hoping they soften up with more use like my daughters'.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

product_meta.title: aden + anais Swaddle Blanket, Boutique Muslin Blankets for Girls & Boys, Baby Receiving Swaddles, Ideal Newborn & Infant Swaddling Set, Perfect Shower Gifts, 4 Pack, Rock Star
product_meta.description: Color:Rock StarFor generations; parents have cared for their babies with muslin. Breathable; versatile and soft as a mother’s touch; the aden + anais classic muslin swaddle ensures baby’s ultimate comfort at bedtime and beyond; as it can also be used as a stroller cover; burp cloth; nursing cover and more. Machine washable; it stays soft wash after wash.
feature_bullets: SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - If at any point in time - for whatever reason – you should be dissatisfied with our baby blanket - don’t hesitate to contact us!

SUPER DURABLE BOUTIQUE QUALITY- Let our extraordinarily high quality muslin assure you that you’re doing the best thing for your baby’s comfort. Superior breathability, natural give, softness and durability. Baby essentials which last a lifetime and provide happiness throughout generations!

LARGE, VERSATILE & STYLISH – Includes four 47” x 47” (120cm x 120cm) swaddle blanket. Our large sizes provide you and your little bundle of joy with enough space for wrapping & swaddling without having to fear that she / he will outgrow the blanket too soon! You can also perfectly use our baby blankets as a receiving blanket, swaddle sack and stroller cover.
THIN, BREATHABLE & SAFE - Each individual 1-layer swaddle blanket is thin enough to provide ample breathability. aden +anais keeps your little one comfortable and safe!

NO MORE SLEEPLESS NIGHTS - Keep your little one from overheating while at the same time providing her / him with a nice comfy blanket. Swaddling recreates the snugness of the womb so your baby is provided with a well-deserved good night’s sleep and enjoys the benefits of the most natural and soothing ways of resting. Our muslin blankets are specifically designed to match your little ones needs!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars2,437 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
